content: संभावनं --ना {@--1@} Considering, reflecting; <ls>R. 5. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Fancying, supposition; संभावनमथोत्येक्षा प्रकृतस्य समेन यत् <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--3@} An idea, fancy, thought. {@--4@} Respect, honour, esteem, regard; संभावनागुणमवेहि तमीश्वराणां <ls>Ś. 7. 4.</ls> {@--5@} Possibility. {@--6@} Fitness, adequacy; <ls>Ki. 3. 39.</ls> {@--7@} Competency, ability. {@--8@} Doubt. {@--9@} Affection, love. {@--10@} Celebrity.
